nodes.text: The Miskara was the ruler of the Vagaari Empire. He was addressed as "Your Eminence," wore ornate robes and a mask, and was seated in an immense throne room.

The Miskara of 27 BBY was killed along with all of his crew shortly before the destruction of Outbound Flight when Trade Federation battle droids and droidekas, thought to be under his command, were turned on them by Commander Thrawn of the Chiss Expansionary Defense Force.
